about_the_game:
Build, Manage, and Thrive in Deep Space

Step up to the challenge of building and maintaining a massive industrial base in deep space. Manage every aspect from a first-person perspective, taking on the crucial roles of builder, operator, and strategist as you struggle to survive alone in a hostile environment.

Resource-Driven Economy

Buy, gather, refine, transport and sell resources to keep your systems running and your machinery operational. Balance supply and demand with the fluctuations of an industrial market that rewards strategic foresight. Efficiency is everything—use your resources wisely.

Survive Against the Elements

Face the unforgiving challenges of deep space with limited resources and no backup. Manage power, oxygen, and other critical supplies, and refill your equipment to avoid catastrophic failure. Every decision is a matter of survival in this relentless setting.

Build, Upgrade, and Automate

Construct your base from the ground up, optimize layouts, and upgrade systems to improve efficiency. Research and implement automated solutions to streamline production and resource management, freeing you up to tackle even greater challenges.

Can You Survive the Deep Space?

Immerse yourself in a high-stakes environment where every choice impacts your survival. Build, manage, and endure—prove your resilience as the lone architect of your survival. The depths of space await your skill.

name: Reprocessed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (version 1607) or newer
  • Processor: Dual-core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.6, 4GB VRAM, 1024x768
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (version 1607) or newer
  • Processor: Quad-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.6, 6GB VRAM, 1920×1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD NVMe

short_description: Factory management and sandbox base building in zero-g environment. Survive, expand and then dominate space industrial market. Build large scale resource processing plant completely from nothing.
